Header: President meets Motor Vehicle AssociationÂ  members
Content: The first conference of the Sri Lanka Motor Vehicle Association of Japan, was held under the patronage of President Maithripala Sirisena.Expressing his views Chairman of the Association Nishantha Meegallewa said that all the stakeholders and the customers should get benefits as a result of the conference. Mr. Meegallewa said that targets could be achieved only through collective efforts of all the stakeholders. Sri Lankan Ambassador in Japan Dhammika Ganganath Dissanayake and members of the Sri Lanka Motor Vehicle Association of Japan were present on the occasion.
